name: White Russian
description: A classic White Russian made with Vodka, coffee liqueur, and cream.

name: Gibson
description: Traditional Gibson made with Gin, dry Vermouth and garnished with pickled onion.

name: Royal Flush
description: Royal Flush made with Crown Royal Whiskey, Peach Schnapps, and Cranberry juice.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: Cosmo made with Vodka, Triple sec, Lime juice, and Cranberry juice with a twist of orange.

name: Mojito
description: Made with white rum, fresh lime, mint, sugar, and soda water.

name: Moscow Mule
description: Classic made with vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice.
